message: Let's start off fair, Bob. A 70/30 split seems reasonable.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. Let's try a 60/40 split this time.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. 65/35, and we can both walk away with something.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. I need to see some real movement towards a fair deal.  55/45 is my final offer.
Bob, time is running out, and the money is literally disappearing. 60/40 is my final offer.
